sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Button } from '../ButtonElement' import { InfoContainer, InfoWrapper,InfoRow,Column1, TextWrapper, TopLine, Heading,Subtitle, BtnWrap,Column2,ImgWrap, Img} from './InfoElement' // import img from '../../images/svg-1.svg' const InfoSection = ({lightBg,id,imgStart, topLine,lightText,darkText, buttonLabel,img,alt,headLine, description,primary,dark,dark2}) => { return ( <> {topLine} {headLine} {description} ) } export default InfoSection
